question: You are interested in applying for a new position at your company but have some questions. Write a letter to you boss. In your letter include:Which position you are consideringWhat questions you have about itHow your boss can help you decide whether or not to apply
text: This is Mee Mee who is currently working as a Senior Sales Support in the Sales department. Indeed , I am writing this letter to reveal my enthusiasm regarding the new position opening in the Engineering department.

To begin with , this new vacancy literally appeals to me . Being an Engineering graduate , I was very eager to work in that department since I joined your company. However , HR requested me to join first in a Sales position because of my 5 years employment history. Moreover , he agreed with me to make an internal transfer whenever there is opened a place.

Accordingly , I have come up with some questions about that matter. I am wondering about the salary offer and fringe benefits. Then , may I need to take internationally recognized diplomas such as CCNA and CCNP ?

Finally , I would like to get a bit of advice from you . Honestly , I am really in the tug of war in my mind. Therefore , being a very experienced and talented employer , could you please give me a hand on whether I should change my direction or not.
Looking forward to your kind suggestion.
